channel.title: NPC Help?
channel.description:
OK i added these to my "autospawn.cfg":
[code] //-- My Own: spawn = 10 2760 3498 0 2762 3500 2762 3500 1 Guard For King spawn = 10 2755 3498 0 2757 3500 2757 3500 1 Guard For King 2 spawn = 1834 2800 3438 0 2802 3440 2802 3440 1 Candle Maker spawn = 1304 2803 3429 0 2805 3431 2805 2429 1 Sailor //General shop spawn = 2675 2816 3441 0 2818 2443 2818 2443 1 Man spawn = 14 2893 3441 0 2895 3443 2895 3443 1 Druid spawn = 1615 3111 9689 0 3113 9691 3113 9693 1 Abyssal Demon //Varrock Underground [/code]
In perfect alignment with the one's above (that were already there) but if you do so it wont even let me log in why... and how do i add NPC's then?

item.title: NPC Help?
item.dc:creator: @bburton31 bburton31
item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

well i changed my source too DragonScape and it worked

and also if you follow the autospawn2.cfg TUT it’ll work i think…

oh, and remember to use TABS!

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help?
item.dc:creator: @KillerbeeWon KillerbeeWon
item.description:
@KillerbeeWon wrote:

I had the same problem. When you log in, you get an error at the bottom of Mopar screen right? Well, i always took that as that i did something wrong. Becuase, when i undid it, it let me on. But, i posted the problem here, but just like your post, no one answers.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Help?
item.dc:creator: @bburton31 bburton31
item.description:
@bburton31 wrote:

OK i added these to my “autospawn.cfg”:

//-- My Own:
spawn = 10      2760    3498    0       2762    3500    2762    3500    1       Guard For King
spawn = 10      2755    3498    0       2757    3500    2757    3500    1       Guard For King 2
spawn = 1834    2800    3438    0       2802    3440    2802    3440    1       Candle Maker
spawn = 1304    2803    3429    0       2805    3431    2805    2429    1       Sailor //General shop
spawn = 2675    2816    3441    0       2818    2443    2818    2443    1       Man
spawn = 14      2893    3441    0       2895    3443    2895    3443    1       Druid
spawn = 1615    3111    9689    0       3113    9691    3113    9693    1       Abyssal Demon //Varrock Underground

In perfect alignment with the one’s above (that were already there) but if you do so it wont even let me log in why… and how do i add NPC’s then?

Read full topic
